Track Market Value You can buy, sell or exchange large variety of cryptocurrencies easily. You can get the market value of your crypto with user friendly interface. Enter as a Guest New Wallet Recover Wallet //signup Create a new wallet Enter phone number to continue //recover wallet Security PIN Pin Verify Enter your security PIN Enter Phrase Key Enter 12 words phrase key for the wallet you want to recover //new wallet If you ever lose your phone, you will need this phrase to recover your wallet Please note it down to access your wallet in future 12 word phrase key //setpin Submit Set Up Security PIN Please enter pin Please re-enter pin Confirm Pin Pins should match Never share your Pin with anyone Turn on Device Biometrics Now that you have created your wallet, why don’t you setup pin for your account’s safety //Home Activity Home Market Trade Stakes Wallet Account Search Notifications Scan You need to Login First !! //home fragment Tux Wallet Buy Tux Deposit Withdraw Favorites Exchange Gainers Losers 24h vol Pair Last Price Volume Ranking List *Terms & Conditions apply Crypto staking is a way to earn passive income Get $1 worth of BTC on your First Deposit. Coin staking is becoming very popular among cryptocurrency investors //account fragment Logout Edit Profile Edit/Update your profile details Settings Update your account settings Contact Us We are here to help //wallet fragment Available Balance Transactions My Wallet //stake fragment Get right on your stakes! Coin staking is becoming very popular among cryptocurrency investors View your stakes history here! Stake Coin Date Stake History Staking The wallet’s entire balance will be staked to a validator, and rewards are automatically distributed according to the amount held in the wallet. There is no function to stake a partial amount in your wallet. In addition, you can send and receive tokens in your wallet anytime, while staking to a validator (There is no lock period). When you first stake, 2 ADA will be charged by the blockchain to create a stake certificate as a deposit. For this, our wallet is set to be able to stake when you have 5 ADA minimum. Rewards Rewards will be distributed per epoch. One epoch is approximately 5 days. Since rewards are automatically distributed from the blockchain, there is no need to “claim rewards”. Please note that in case that you stake ADA in the first time, you will need to wait 20 days to be approved and then another 5 days (one epoch) for the first cycle to complete in order to earn rewards. This means you should start earning your rewards 25 days after clicking Staking and then every 5 days after that. //settings fragment Change Wallet Pin Set Pin Language Currency Biometrics for login Pin for login Dark Mode Currency Updated Successfully //language English (US) Japanese Chinese Confirm Choose language //change pin Old Pin New Pin Confirm Pin The old pin entered is incorrect //pin login Forgot Pin Cancel Please enter your PIN //edit profile Save Changes //contact us Email ID Full Name Send Subject Description Enter Subject Enter Description Enter your Full Name Enter your Email ID We have received your mail and we’ll get back to you soon Instructions *Your email won’t be published *it may take 2-3 working days to revert back //market Name/Vol 24 Hr Change //exchange Crypto Amount Exchanging Receiving // notifications Clear All Accept Decline Tincidunt a ipsum facilisis egestas in vel.
